job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions, which is a core task in adapting models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are traditional software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities with human expertise to enhance a service, fitting the definition of integrating AI into a system.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products, a key aspect of adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating a pragmatic approach to overcoming challenges.

profile.rationale: The job primarily focuses on integrating AI systems and improving them through feedback and fine-tuning (Macro-Category A tasks like 'Software Development & Integration' and 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning' which are used to improve the AI system). While there's mention of 'AI model fine-tuning', the core responsibility is supporting customer resolutions by bridging gaps where AI falls short and improving the AI system itself, rather than developing novel AI models from scratch or specializing deeply in GenAI techniques. The role is about applying AI to enhance an existing support function, making it AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. The tasks lean towards applying and refining existing AI rather than deep research or development of new AI models. The profile assignment is straightforward based on this focus. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the term 'fine-tuning' could imply deeper ML work, but the overall context points to an adjacent role.
